body.name: COMFEE’ Portable Washing Machine, 0.9 Cu.ft Compact Washer With LED Display, 5 Wash Cycles, 2 Built-in Rollers, Space Saving Full-Automatic Washer, Ideal for RV/Dorm/Apartment, Ivory White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 8 hrs 26 mins
features: The full-automatic washing machine is equipped with Heavy, Soft, Normal, Rapid, and Soak. With 5 programs and 3 water levels, you are allowed to quickly start the machine the way you like. You are also welcome to customize your washing program by selecting load size, and adding wash time, rinse time, and spin time..Operation mode : Fully Automatic

This top-load compact washing machine with only 18.1 inches in width, 17.7 inches in depth, and 31.5 inches in height, this portable washer can be stored easily. You can store it in your cabinet, RV, dorm, or even bathroom. Even better, it comes with wheels and handles for easy movement. It is a perfect choice for small households with limited space and minimal optimal.

With the transparent lid design, this washing machine allows you to see and monitor the water and washing conditions. Featuring a durable rust-resistant steel inner tub, lint filter, water inlet and drain pump which allows you to easily drain out dirty water. In addition, this portable laundry washing machine has an LED display that shows the time left to finish.

This compact design washing machine has DOE (Department of Energy) certificate that clearly shows how much energy would be consumed under national average conditions. Saving as much as 87.5% energy consumption compared to similar models, it equips with a powerful and durable motor, up to 840RPM spin speed but quiet when running.

Unbalance could be a very serious issue for washing machines. It could cause the washing machine to "dance on the floor", or even worse, to unleash itself from the water inlet, leaking everywhere. Equipped with Auto Unbalance Detection (AUD), however, it's able to automatically fix the unbalance issue by allowing more water to come in. It will also alert the user if the problem can't be fixed, ensuring a safe and pleasant experience. NOTE: Refer to the PDF attached below in Technical Specification for the Installation and Troubleshooting Steps.
body.description: Feeling unsafe going to Laundromat? Tire of sending and picking up clothes from public washer? Want to have your own laundry setup in your bathroom? Let this little machine do all the magic for you! It's small, space saving, and yet powerful to take care of your daily laundry needs.- Space saving, fits in your room/RV/dormetory nicely- High quality and durable motor, providing stable power- Stainless steel inner tub with multiple washing programs to choose from- See-through lid and LED display- Wheels to move aroud- Reloading feature to let you pause and add-in forgotten clothes

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enjoy Your Comfy Life Comfee is a professional manufacturer of home appliances. By providing high-quality products and good service, Comfee is earning a good reputation and a larger market share in the past few days. Comfee purposed to build better living through affordability, enhanced experiences. Hope we can bring more joy and convenience to your family life. COMFEE' Portable washing machine Let this little machine do all the magic for you! It's small, space saving, and yet powerful to take care of your daily laundry needs. Space-saving fits in your room/RV/dormitory nicelyHigh quality and durable motor, providing stable powerStainless steel inner tub with multiple washing programs to choose fromSee-through lid and LED displayWheels to move around Item Weight: 44.1 pounds Product Dimensions: 18.1 x 17.7 x 31.5 inches Package include: 1x full automatic washing machine, 1x Water inlet hose, 1x Converter

Easy to Install Completes within 3 simple steps 1. Hook up the hose to a faucet Comes with a quick adaptor, you are allowed to easily fix the fill hose onto your kitchen or washroom faucet after removing the aerator. 2. Secure the drain hose to a sink to allow dirty water to drain. 3. Simply plug in the device, turn the water on, and you are all set! Easy to use Less is more Equipped with Heavy, Soft, Normal, Rapid and Soak programs, you are allowed to quickly start the machine the way you like. You are also welcomed to customize your washing program by selecting load size, adding additional wash time, rinse time, and spin time. Easy to store and relocate Don't lift it, wheel it! With only 18.1 inches in width, 17.7 inches in depth, and 31.5 inches in height, this portable washer is able to be stored easily. You can store it in your cabinet, RV, dorm, or even bathtub! Even better, it comes with wheels so that it can show up anywhere it needs to be.

Auto Unbalance Detection Vibrate mode off! Unbalance could be a very serious issue for washing machines. It could cause the washing machine to "dance on the floor", or even worse, to unleash itself from the water inlet, leaking everywhere. Equipped with Auto Unbalance Detection (AUD), however, it's able to automatically fix the unbalance issue by allowing more water to come in. It will also alert the user if the problem can't be fixed, ensuring a safe and pleasant experience. Extremely Energy Saving Saves energy, and money Our product has a DOE (Department of Energy) certificate that clearly shows how much energy would be consumed on national average conditions. Saving as much as 87.5% energy consumption comparing to similar models. * *Based on DOE’s estimation on the average cost of energy when used with a natural gas water heater. See-through lid+LED Display Seeing is believing A transparent lid allows you to see and monitor the water and washing condition. LED display shows the time left to finish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small bit mighty
reviews.reviewText: I have had this little machine for 2 years now and it is amazing. Living in an apartment with washer and dryer made doing laundry an inconvenience. This machine does a great job at cleaning and getting the water out of the clothes on the spin cycle. If you’re on the fence about this machine…it’s worth the money even if you’re doing smaller loads. I did have to hook this up at the kitchen sink versus the tub or bathroom sink because I have a small bathroom but it has wonderful. Small enough to move with ease but big enough to wash multiple big towels and even sheets and blankets. Don’t count this washer out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The machine was easy to set up , attach to my sink. The tub inside is huge . It reminds me of a smaller normal size washer tub. Works well . Clothes are coming out clean. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GAME CHANGER FOR THIS APARTMENT DWELLER
reviews.reviewText: No more sorting, bagging, loading into the trunk to drive, walk or catch a bus to a secondary location ( laundromat, friend’s house ), unload the bags of laundry, sit, wait, wash, dry, then have to re-bag, re-load into trunk, drive, walk, catch a bus back home to AGAIN unload, un-bag, to iron, fold, and/or hang, nd put away.Oh my Goodness!! The freedom of doing your laundry in your own space using your own machines is a TREMENDOUS BLESSING!!I live in a 1BR, 1BA apartment with no hookups. This compact washer fits perfectly in my small kitchen with the drain hose in the kitchen sink.Moving it into place was a bit of a workout but it has wheels on the bottom, In The Back Only and not he front, and inverted handles on the side which made it a little easier. And it doesn’t roll well on my low pile, Berber carpet, so, I found it easier to “walk” it.I stood behind the machine, tilting it back toward me onto it’s wheels, and just kinda walked it into position.It IS a bit noisy but not so much that it bothers me or my neighbors. To me, it’s no more noisy than a full size washer.DO NOT make the mistake I made and simply sit the drain hose inside a bucket because the hose was too short to reach the sink, thinking that A BUCKET🤨 will be enough to hold all the water as it drains at the end of the cycle. DUH!!Fortunately, I ran the suggested Test Run and sat nearby monitoring. I was able to catch the over pour and remedy the situation preventing a flooding problem. For the time being, I have to scoot the washer closer to the sink every time I do a wash, so that the drain hose reaches.Ive, ordered an extension hose to so that I won’t have to much longer.Great washer. Works great. Instructions were easy to follow. In excellent condition.JUST ONE ISSUE: it came without the bottom cover. It was supposed to be packaged in the box along with the machine itself and the hoses but it was not. So, if you tilt it back and look underneath the machine you can see all of it’s guts & parts.I was concerned that this might be an issue but upon Googling it, learned that back in the day ALL washers came without a bottom cover, with their guts exposed.I’ve washed 3 loads, so far, with this not being an issue. No drips, no leaks, nothing.Plus I ordered a drain pan that I have it sitting in that gives me a level of security.One of the best purchases I’ve made, so far. No regrets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very loud in spin cycle, but washes very well.
reviews.reviewText: First off, if you're planning on being sneaky with adding a portable machine to your apartment - your neighbors absolutely will hear this one! Both down stairs and next door neighbors will know, because the spin cycle sounds like a freight train. I did level it with a tool, and I got a thick rubber shop mat to put under it. You can still hear the machine from two rooms away with all doors closed once it goes into the spin cycle.As for the job it does, I have no complaints there. Only the quick 15 minute setting (which washes for 3 minutes) doesn't wash adequately. All other settings are great. It washes like any standard full size machine. If I'd known that it was this good, I'd have gotten one years ago.I have the 2.0 size and the amount of clothes it washes is about 10-15 adult pieces, depending on what type of clothes. Obviously that you can fit more tank tops than sweatshirts. If I wash a mixed load of leggings, tank tops, and womens t-shirts I do about 15 pieces.To give an easy to eyeball quantity - the short plastic laundry baskets that are about 1.5 bushel size (the 24" x 17" x 10" baskets)... you can fit 3/4 of that basket for a large load in this machine. When my basket is 3/4 full, it's time to wash. This washer is about half the size of a standard household machine.It doesn't have a center agitator, so pants and long sleeve tops tangle. I have to open the lid before spin cycles and untangle the spaghetti monster or it gets unbalanced and even louder with banging around. It's an added chore, but not a big deal because there is a pause button.If you have a faucet which is like a hose that pulls out, you shouldn't connect the machine to it. The adapter may fit, but I found info elsewhere (not provided by manufacturer) that says fluctuating pressure from machine use can burst that hose. I had to instead use it at another sink which is in a less ideal location, but it's not a big deal. I'm just happy that I found that info before a plumbing emergency happened!I see that some reviewers are confused about blue drum vs no blue drum. The 2.0 size has an all gray drum. Some of the other sizes have blue colored bottom inside, but not the 2.0!Delivery was great in the sense that they scheduled and arrived in time. The delivery guys were nice, and they brought the machine upstairs for me. The box was not damaged. But the machine inside had some dents to the metal body in places. It doesn't seem to have affected function, but it's unsightly from one side.I would recommend to put it on a dolly, even if you won't be moving it. If you ever have a splash or a leak, or to clean the filter in the back, you'll want better wheels. The wheels that come on it are bare minimum function and basically only useful to get it place, not to move it around. The 2.0 size is 80 lbs when empty, so not a dainty thing.Speaking of splashes! The reason you should use HE detergent is because regular detergent foams too much and then some of the excess foam leaks from the bottom. Just water doesn't leak, and detergent that doesn't foam like crazy doesn't leak.One thing I wish for is a more customizable custom cycle. I want a longer wash time combined with the shortest 3 minute spin cycle (because my neighbors have complained about the noise of this machine) but I can't make that combo. Only the lousy quick wash cycle has a 3 minute spin... all others are 7 or 12 minute spin.I'm deducting one star for the noise level of the spin cycle. Other than that, I'm happy with the machine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good size, clean well, pump well
reviews.reviewText: My bathroom is about 90 ft^2 but has enough space for the machine. Installation is not hard. Noise is not bad at all. machine is dry after water is pumped out. The only downside is that the wheels might not be the easiest to maneuver, but this is for a small apartment anyway, and it won't take long to put it back to the storage space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this washing machine.
reviews.reviewText: I live in a tiny house, so I needed a small washing machine. This thing is fully automatic, unlike some other portable washing machines. It does a great job cleaning, even on the rapid wash setting and cold water. I have only used the Heavy Duty setting once, when my jeans got caked in mud from the knees down. It handled the job great. I have the same brand of mini dishwasher, and love it just as much. Needless to say, I am now sold on the Comfee brand.
